com.xeoh.android.texthighlighter

Interface TextHighlighter.Matcher

  • Enclosing class:
    TextHighlighter

    public static interface TextHighlighter.Matcher
    Its method will be called to find position of highlighting text.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getMatchIndices(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String keyword)
      Implement algorithm to find matching indices.
      boolean isHighlightable(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String keyword)
      Implement algorithm to detecting any matching word exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchIndices

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getMatchIndices(java.lang.String origin,
                                                       java.lang.String keyword)
        Implement algorithm to find matching indices.

        getMatchIndices("Hello world! We are the world". "world") should return [7,14]

        Parameters:
        origin - whole text
        keyword - word you want to highlight
        Returns:
        matching indies

      • isHighlightable

        boolean isHighlightable(java.lang.String origin,
                        java.lang.String keyword)
        Implement algorithm to detecting any matching word exist.
        Parameters:
        origin - whole text
        keyword - word you want to highlight
        Returns:
        true for if any text matches, otherwise false
